claims.claim: TQL uses automation and AI tools daily to streamline high volume processes, enabling team members to focus on higher-value activities
claims.quote: TQL uses automation and AI tools every day to help streamline high volume processes so our team members can focus on service, problem-solving and relationship building.

claims.claim: AI innovations developed through hackathons have practical applications across multiple TQL processes
claims.quote: Team Rocket's winning concept can also be applied to other TQL processes.

claims.claim: TQL has achieved remarkable growth and scale to become the largest privately owned company in Greater Cincinnati
claims.quote: Headquartered in Clermont County's Union Township, TQL is now the largest privately owned company in Greater Cincinnati.

claims.claim: TQL has experienced significant revenue growth, contributing to the transportation logistics industry's quadrupling from $57 billion to over $213.5 billion
claims.quote: Transportation logistics is one of the fastest growing U.S. industries, quadrupling in revenues from $57 billion in 2000 to more than $213.5 billion in 2018

claims.claim: TQL's business model enables brokers to handle high-volume operations with 75-100 sales calls per day
claims.quote: brokers at TQL typically make 75 to 100 sales calls a day trying to drum up new customers

claims.claim: TQL demonstrates superior employee satisfaction with 83% saying it's a great place to work versus 57% at typical companies
claims.quote: 83% of employees at Total Quality Logistics say it is a great place to work compared to 57% of employees at a typical U.S.-based company.

claims.claim: TQL achieves 51% higher employee retention than typical U.S. workplaces
claims.quote: Higher retention: 51% higher than a typical U.S. workplace

claims.claim: TQL operates at significant scale with 8,723 U.S.-based employees
